title: Himi 236
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ke ‘ā hoku laumālie,
Fakataha mo e la’ā,
Pea fai ho’o ngāue,
‘O hokohoko ‘aho pē.
2.
Li’aki ‘a e tō’ohi,
‘O tu’u hengihengi hake;
‘O atu ho pongipongi,
Ko e fa’a fakafeta’i.
3.
Mo ke ‘ahi’ahi foki,
Ke huhu’i ‘a e taimi,
‘A ia ne ke li’aki,
Mo ke me’angāue ‘aki.
4.
Pea ke fai he ‘aho ni,
Hangē ko ho ‘aho mui;
Mo ke fa’a ngāue ‘aki,
‘A ho ngaahi taleniti.
5.
Pea ke fa’a teu’i koe,
Ki he fu’u ‘aho lahi,
‘A ia ‘e kātoa ai,
‘A e kakai ‘o māmani.
6.
Vakai ke angatonu pē,
‘A ho ngaahi talanoa,
Pea tatau ho ‘atamai,
Pea mo e langi ma’a.
7.
He ‘oku vakili, ‘e he
Fofonga ‘o e ‘Otua;
Ho’o ngaahi mahalo fufū,
Pea mo ho’o ngaahi lea.
8.
Ke ‘ā hake hoku loto,
‘O kau mo e kau ‘āngelo;
Pea hiva fiefia,
Ki he Tu’i ta’engata.
9.
Ke tau tuku kolōlia,
Ki he ‘Otua totonu,
Ko e tupu’anga ia,
‘O e lelei kotoa pē.
10.
Ke fai ia, ‘e he kakai
Kotoa pē, ‘i lalo ni;
Mo e kakai kotoa pē,
‘I hēvani , ‘i ‘olunga.
11.
Fakafeta’i ki he Tamai,
Pea mo e ‘Alo foki;
Mo e Laumālie lelei,
Ke fai pe ‘o ta’etuku. *
